text: Robyn Lawley (born 13 June 1989) is an Australian plus-size model and fashion designer. Robyn was born in Girraween, New South Wales. She started modelling when she was sixteen years old. She was on the covers of French Elle and Vogue Italia. She was the first model for Mango's plus-size line, Violeta by Mango. She designed a swimwear line. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Australian models Category:Living people Category:People from New South Wales
title: Robyn Lawley
